alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 12:48AM MST until January 18 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Higher amounts of around 3 to 5 inches are possible along the foothills of Casper Mountain on the south side of Casper. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
